mcp-n8n-stable.comment: STABLE: Uses published package from PyPI

mcp-n8n-dev.comment: DEV: Uses local editable install (pip install -e)

usage: Enable ONLY ONE server at a time:
- For stable: keep mcp-n8n-stable, comment out mcp-n8n-dev
- For dev: keep mcp-n8n-dev, comment out mcp-n8n-stable
toggle_to_dev: 1. Ensure dev install: cd /path/to/mcp-n8n && pip install -e .[dev]
4. Update paths to match your system
_instructions.rollback: If dev breaks, toggle back to stable following toggle_to_stable steps
